item.title: Sharing Container Images using the Docker CLI or Carvel's imgpkg
item.author: Robert Guske
item.description: Learn how to make container images available in a shareable format, to support e.g. air-gapped deployments, using the Docker CLI or imgpkg by Carvel.

item.title: VMware ovftool installation was unsuccessful on Ubuntu 20.04 - A workaround
item.author: Robert Guske
item.description: I couldn't install the VMware ovftool on my Ubuntu 20.04 LTS client and because of this, I'm going to explain how you can run it without having it installed.

item.title: A Linux Development Desktop with VMware Horizon - Part II: Applications
item.author: Robert Guske
item.description: Part II - In this post I´m going to list a couple of applications which I´m using for my desktop and how you can easily install them from your shell.

item.title: A Linux Development Desktop with VMware Horizon - Part III: Shell
item.author: Robert Guske
item.description: Part III - A guide on the "Highway" to Shell.
